name: Rehmat - Quran, Dua, Nohay, Live TV and More
description: Salamun Alaikum,  By the grace of Allah (S.W.T), Taufeeqat of Imam-e-Zamana (A.T.F.S) and the blessings of my parents and loved ones, I am pleased to introduce to you the first version of Rehmat, A Shia community application developed with an aim to make the use of digital platform to spread the message of Ahlulbayt(S.A) and dedicated to the Master of our age, Our 12th Imam, Hazrat Mehdi (A.T.F.S).  The app contains Complete Holy Quran, Ziyarats, Namaz, Etc.  Based on the reviews and feedbacks, will try to bring some more features which will make it easier and convenient to use.  I have tried my level best to make this application bug free, but still if you find any mistakes and/or bug, please raise it to me and i will try to rectify it in next upgrades Insha Allah.  Please share your valuable feedbacks.  Iltemas-e-Dua, Mohammad Abbas Sayed mdabbas20@gmail.com Pune, India
